## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install brightseg in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure brightseg package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to brightseg
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/IntegratedPathologyUnit-ICR/brightseg):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/IntegratedPathologyUnit-ICR/brightseg.git
```

or from
[conda](https://anaconda.org/IntegratedPathologyUnit-ICR/brightseg)

``` sh
$ conda install -c IntegratedPathologyUnit-ICR brightseg
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/brightseg/)

``` sh
$ pip install brightseg
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/IntegratedPathologyUnit-ICR/brightseg)’s
[pages](https://IntegratedPathologyUnit-ICR.github.io/brightseg/).
Additionally you can find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/IntegratedPathologyUnit-ICR/brightseg) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/brightseg/) respectively.
